m_szDocTitle: Hyundai Tuscon Fuel Cell hits Californian roads with free hydrogen
m_szDocSumamry: Hyundai Tuscon Fuel Cell hits Californian roads with free hydrogen Image Gallery (4 images) The hydrogen economy sounds great, and has ever since it was first proposed in the 1970s. The tricky bit is how to get there, because without the necessary infrastructure, a fuel cell car that runs on hydrogen is little more than a conversation piece. As Hyundai delivers its first Tucson Fuel Cell CUV to its new lessee, Timothy Bush, the South Korean carmaker unveiled its plan to jump-start the hydrogen car economy by giving the fuel away to its customers.
